Pages.Name: prop_vehicle_apc
Pages.Description: APC with mounted guns, can only be driven by a vehicle driver or a npc_apcdriver.

Properties.Description: Some models have multiple versions of their textures, called skins.
Distance at which the prop starts to fade (<0 = subtract from fademaxdist).
Maximum distance at which the prop is visible (0 = don't fade out).

If you specify a fade in the worldspawn, or if the engine is running under low end/medium end/XBox360, then the engine will forcibly fade out props even if fademindist/fademaxdist isn't specified. This scale factor gives you some control over the fade. Using 0 here turns off the forcible fades. Numbers smaller than 1 cause the prop to fade out at further distances, and greater than 1 cause it to fade out at closer distances.
If true this geometry is not important for precomputed lighting
If true this geometry is used as an occluder for precomputed visibility
Alpha of the fade, where 0 = fully transparent and 255 = fully opaque.

Name by which this entity is linked to another entity in a different map. When the player transitions to a new map, entities in the new map with globalnames matching entities in the previous map will have the previous map's state copied over their state.
Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
Name of one or more info_apc_missile_hint entities to use to determine what to hit.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game.

InputOutputs.Name: Action
InputOutputs.Description: Set the speed of the action animation

InputOutputs.Name: TurnOn
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on: Start engine & enable throttle

InputOutputs.Name: TurnOff
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off: Stop engine, disable throttle, engage brakes.

InputOutputs.Name: Lock
InputOutputs.Description: Prevent the player from entering or exiting the vehicle.

InputOutputs.Name: Unlock
InputOutputs.Description: Re-allow the player to enter or exit the vehicle.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerOn
InputOutputs.Description: Player entered the vehicle

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerOff
InputOutputs.Description: Player exited the vehicle

InputOutputs.Name: PressedAttack
InputOutputs.Description: Player Pressed attack key

InputOutputs.Name: PressedAttack2
InputOutputs.Description: Player Pressed attack2 key

InputOutputs.Name: AttackAxis
InputOutputs.Description: State of attack button [0,1]

InputOutputs.Name: Attack2Axis
InputOutputs.Description: State of attack2 button [0,1]

InputOutputs.Name: HandBrakeOn
InputOutputs.Description: Turns the handbrake on

InputOutputs.Name: HandBrakeOff
InputOutputs.Description: Releases the handbrake

InputOutputs.Name: FireMissileAt
InputOutputs.Description: A target to fire a missile at

InputOutputs.Name: Destroy
InputOutputs.Description: Causes the APC to blow up.

InputOutputs.Name: OnFiredMissile
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the APC shoots a missile.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDeath
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the APC is killed.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDamaged
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the APC is damaged.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDamagedByPlayer
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the APC is damaged by the player.
